hints.content:
##Quadrilateral

A quadrilateral is [[☃ definition 1]] with $4$ sides.

[[☃ explanation 1]]

options.definition: A closed figure with four straight sides.

options.explanation: ![Three distinct quadrilaterals displayed side-by-side on a white background. From left to right: a bright blue square, a vibrant red rectangle, and a green trapezoid. Each shape is clearly defined with sharp, straight edges and distinct vertices, all rendered within a 256x256 pixel canvas.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c45b54564065ad81025549d707e6113a7f936e22)

hints.content: Which of the shapes is a polygon with $4$ sides?

The following shapes are quadrilaterals:

 | | 
- | - 
![A clear, two-dimensional geometric shape, specifically a vibrant blue square, perfectly centered on a white background. It has four equal straight sides and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.](/assets/1765813826076-0.9696903387765115.png) | ![A distinct, two-dimensional geometric shape, a vibrant green rectangle, horizontally oriented and perfectly centered on a white background. It features four straight sides, with opposite sides equal in length, and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.](/assets/1765813809244-0.7871862812221502.png)

web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseu.alt: A distinct, two-dimensional geometric shape, a vibrant green rectangle, horizontally oriented and perfectly centered on a white background. It features four straight sides, with opposite sides equal in length, and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.

A clear, two-dimensional geometric shape, specifically a vibrant blue square, perfectly centered on a white background. It has four equal straight sides and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.

question.content:
**Which of the following shapes are quadrilaterals?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A distinct, two-dimensional geometric shape, specifically a vibrant blue square, perfectly centered on a white background. It has four equal straight sides and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.](/assets/1765813840054-0.6023421162832082.png)
choices.alt: A distinct, two-dimensional geometric shape, specifically a vibrant blue square, perfectly centered on a white background. It has four equal straight sides and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.

choices.content: ![A regular pentagon, a polygon with five equal straight sides and five equal interior angles, rendered in a distinct red color. The shape is clearly depicted and centered on a clean white background, sized at 256x256 pixels.](/assets/1765813855269-0.6200881744134674.png)
choices.alt: A regular pentagon, a polygon with five equal straight sides and five equal interior angles, rendered in a distinct red color. The shape is clearly depicted and centered on a clean white background, sized at 256x256 pixels.

choices.content: ![A non-polygon shape with a unique form: three straight sides forming a partial enclosure, with a distinct smooth, curved arc completing its boundary. The shape is rendered in a bright yellow color, clearly defined and centered on a plain white background, sized at 256x256 pixels.](/assets/1765813870060-0.24272534492012898.png)
choices.alt: A non-polygon shape with a unique form: three straight sides forming a partial enclosure, with a distinct smooth, curved arc completing its boundary. The shape is rendered in a bright yellow color, clearly defined and centered on a plain white background, sized at 256x256 pixels.

choices.content: ![A distinct, two-dimensional geometric shape, a vibrant green rectangle, horizontally oriented and perfectly centered on a white background. It features four straight sides, with opposite sides equal in length, and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.](/assets/1765813889202-0.8010801637010373.png)
choices.alt: A distinct, two-dimensional geometric shape, a vibrant green rectangle, horizontally oriented and perfectly centered on a white background. It features four straight sides, with opposite sides equal in length, and four 90-degree angles, rendered within a 256x256 pixel dimension.
